abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((4.3328 50.93303,4.32604 50.93445,4.31713 50.9285,4.32046 50.92464,4.32936 50.92282,4.33602 50.92579,4.3328 50.93303))", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "OccurrenceStatus is Present" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Chrysomelidae of Central Europe 1 records from Bird tracking - GPS tracking of Lesser Black-backed Gulls and Herring Gulls breeding at the southern North Sea coast 1 records from Geographically tagged INSDC sequences 1 records from Xeno-canto - Bird sounds from around the world 1 records from NMNH Paleobiology Specimen Records 1 records from Ecological typology of waterways, vegetation surveys 1 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 2 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 2 records from CSIC-Real Jardín Botánico-Colección de Plantas Vasculares (MA) 2 records from Biodiversity4all Research-Grade Observations 4 records from Natural History Museum Rotterdam - Specimens 4 records from My naturesounds - nature observations with sound recordings 4 records from Saltabel - Orthoptera in Belgium 5 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Botany 6 records from Muskrat captures in Flanders, Belgium 7 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 12 records from Zomerganzen - Summering geese management and population counts in Flanders, Belgium 12 records from Belgian Coccinellidae - Ladybird beetles in Belgium 42 records from EOD - eBird Observation Dataset 66 records from Species observations during citizen science expeditions 76 records from Pl@ntNet observations 102 records from Broedvogels - Atlas of the breeding birds in Flanders 2000-2002 103 records from Waarnemingen.be - Non-native plant occurrences in Flanders and the Brussels Capital Region, Belgium 215 records from Pl@ntNet automatically identified occurrences 261 records from Meise Botanic Garden Herbarium (BR) 272 records from Plants galls 954 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations 1037 records from Florabank1 - A grid-based database on vascular plant distribution in the northern part of Belgium (Flanders and the Brussels Capital region) 1324 records from Miscellaneous Vascular Plants 1376 records from Bird Monitoring 2017, Meise Botanic Garden 1523 records from Watervogels - Wintering waterbirds in Flanders, Belgium 3129 records from Waarnemingen.be - Non-native animal occurrences in Flanders and the Brussels Capital Region, Belgium 8814 records from Waterbirds of the Botanic Garden Meise
